meanings.definition: The person who is called or contacted, especially in a telephone call or computer program.
meanings.sent1: When the phone rang, the callee answered with a cheerful hello.
meanings.sent2: The callee received many messages on their voicemail.
meanings.sent3: The computer program tried to reach the callee, but it was on vacation.
meanings.sent4: In the digital world, the callee is the one who receives the virtual call.
meanings.sent5: The callee is like the star of the show, always in the spotlight of communication.
